Time to fangirl/fanboy! - *Encouraging fellow fans to show their support.*

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_ja: Time of denying being a fan
CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: The period of denying that you're becoming a fan - *Humorously referencing the initial resistance to falling for her charm.*

CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Crying my eyes out (so touched/sad)
Max level of social skills (ultimate social butterfly)
Lisa, an insurmountable wall (Lisa is unmatched)
Fangirling/Fanboying is my power
Hit the jackpot! I met Lisa!

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: Lisa, the best thing that ever happened to my life! (Life Four Cuts Lisa - meaning she's perfect like a perfect photo booth pic)
Lisa, even her tears are cute! (Romgok yemnyomnyom is crying spelled backwards, onomatopoeia for crying)
Lisa, the ultimate social butterfly! (Hae-ginssa - super popular)
Lisa, a sudden burst of happiness! (Gapbun Lisa - suddenly Lisa)
Lisa, the ultimate beautiful boss! (Jonye-boseu - super pretty boss)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Human embodiment of luxury (brand)
Her face justifies everything (literally, her face is the reason/logic)
Destroy the stage! (Referring to her performance)
God Lisa
Lisa, the insurmountable wall (meaning she's unmatched)

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: Her face is welfare (meaning it provides happiness and comfort)
Face genius, hooray!
Raising national prestige with her face
Human Dior (meaning she embodies the Dior brand perfectly)
Born Beautiful Lisa (combining "íƒœ" from "íƒœì–´ë‚˜ë‹¤" - to be born - with "ì˜" from "ì˜ˆì˜ë‹¤" - to be pretty, and Lisa's name)

REQ_HEART.meaning_en: Lisa, I'm hitting that like button! (Indicating strong approval & love)
Lisa, you're absolutely killing it!ğŸ’– (Expressing admiration for her performance and visuals)
Human Chanel Lisaâœ¨ (Referring to her status as a luxury brand ambassador and overall elegant presence)
Lisa, you make my heart go boom boom! (Expressing a fluttery, excited feeling)
Lisa, your visuals are straight out of a manga! (Complimenting her stunning looks)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Rice Lisa! (Eat Well!) - Play on words with her name, urging her to eat heartily.
Dumpling Lisa, long life and health! - Using "mandu" (dumpling) as a cute nickname and wishing her good health and longevity, focusing on well-being.
Foodie Lisa, nom nom good! - Praising her good taste in food and encouraging her to enjoy eating delicious things.
Life like Lisa, meals like honey! - This expresses a desire for a sweet and enjoyable eating experience, comparing it to Lisa's successful life.
Happy Lisa, enjoy your delicious lunch! -  A simple wish for her to have a happy and tasty lunch, associating her with happiness.

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: Lisa Princess, don't be sick! (Don't be in pain!)
Lisa, let's only walk on flower paths! Be careful of colds!
My singer Lisa, health is the absolute best! (Health is the most important!)
Insider Lisa, if you get sick, it's a loss for the ultimate insider! (You're too popular to get sick!)
Lisa, the one beyond reach, take care of your health!

GREET_JOB.meaning_en: Crying a river (Literally: Explosion of Tears) - *Used to express extreme emotion, often in a humorous way. Perfect for when Lisa absolutely slays a performance.*
Max level social skills (Insider Power Max Level) - *Highlighting Lisa's charisma and popularity.*
Seriously Pretty Boss (Extremely Beautiful Boss) - *A direct and powerful way to compliment Lisa's beauty and stage presence.*
Staning is my power (My love for Lisa is my strength) - *Expressing how Lisa inspires and energizes you.*
Infinite times (Countless times) - *Meaning "I love you/support you a million times over." Used for expressing overwhelming affection.*
